title.en: In This Life, I Will Raise You Well, Your Majesty!

altTitles.ko: 이번 생은 제대로 키워 드리겠습니다, 폐하!

altTitles.en: I'll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!
I'll Atone by Raising You Properly in This Life, Your Majesty!

altTitles.ja: 皇妃さまの育児論～2度目は失敗いたしません!～

altTitles.vi: Kiếp này, ta sẽ nuôi dạy Bệ Hạ thật tốt!

description.de:
Als Ellisa ihre Augen öffnet und in das Gesicht ihres jungen Sohnes Leon sieht, das voller Liebe und Sorge auf sie herabblickt, wird ihr klar, dass sie durch irgendein Wunder eine zweite Chance erhalten hat. In ihrem vergangenen Leben dachte sie, sie könne Leons Sicherheit nur gewährleisten, indem sie ihn zum Kaiser macht. Wenn sie aber gewusst hätte, dass Leon die Krone überhaupt nicht will und er sich das Leben nehmen würde, wenn ihm die Krone, getränkt mit dem Blut seiner Freunde und Feinde, präsentiert wird, dann hätte Ellisa einen anderen Weg gefunden, ihren Sohn zu beschützen. In diesem Leben ist sie fest entschlossen, eine Möglichkeit zu finden, um sowohl Leons Überleben als auch sein Glück zu bewahren ... denn dieses Mal wird alles anders.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
description.en:
When Ellisa opens her eyes and sees her young son, Leon, staring at her with eyes full of love and concern, she realizes that, by some miracle, she’s been given a second chance. In her past life, she thought making Leon emperor was the only way to ensure his safety. But if she had known Leon had never wanted the crown, or that laying a crown soaked with the blood of his enemies and beloved ones at his feet would mean he would take his own life before her eyes, she would’ve found another way. In this life, Ellisa is determined to find a way that will ensure both Leon’s survival and happiness. This time, things will be different.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
description.fr:
Lorsqu’Ellisa se réveille et aperçoit son jeune fils, Leon, l’observer avec des yeux remplis d’amour et de tendresse, elle comprend qu’on lui a miraculeusement accordé une seconde chance. Dans sa vie passée, elle croyait que pousser son fils à devenir empereur était le seul moyen de garantir sa sécurité. Mais si elle avait su que Leon n’avait jamais voulu monter sur le trône ou que déposer à ses pieds une couronne imbibée du sang de ses ennemis et de ses proches signifierait qu’il s’ôterait la vie sous ses yeux, elle aurait trouvé une autre solution. Dans cette vie, Ellisa est déterminée à trouver un moyen qui assurera la survie et le bonheur de Leon. Cette fois, ce sera différent !

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
description.ja:
自分の欲によって息子のレオンと罪なき皇太子アセンシオを死なせた第2皇妃エリサ。2度めの生では子どもたちが望むままに生きていける世界にすると誓った。子どもたちを守るため、エリサはまず皇太子の信頼を得て彼の後見人になる。騎士団を創設し、水の精霊と契約するなど、他にも積極的に動くエリサに、皇帝カイトまでもが彼女に注目し始めるが…。

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
description.vi:
Nhị Hoàng Hậu Elisa đã dành trọn kiếp trước để đưa con trai Leon lên ngai vàng.

Dùng mọi thủ đoạn tàn nhẫn, hy sinh những người cô yêu quý, quay lưng với đau khổ và oán hận của chính Leon, bởi cô tin ngôi vị Hoàng Đế là cách duy nhất để bảo vệ con trai mình.

Thế nhưng, thứ Leon cần không phải là Hoàng vị. Chỉ đến khi con trai tự sát trên ngai vàng, Elisa mới hiểu được điều ấy. 

Sống lại thêm một lần nữa, đối diện với đôi mắt trẻ thơ đầy lo lắng của Leon, Elisa quyết định sẽ thay đổi số mệnh của họ.

Lần này, nhất định đích đến sẽ là hạnh phúc.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
